oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New Testament given by Maryland Bible Society to Pvt. Alexander Walker
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bible presented at "Bible House, Baltimore" to Pvt. Walker. Walker was from Claiborne County and served in Co. F, 3rd Inf. Regt. of the East Tennessee Volunteers, USA. Presentation tag reads: "Should I die on the battle field or in Hospital, for the sake of humanity, acquaint Miss Mary Walker residing at Walnut Grove Acad[emy] Knox County Tennessee of the fact, and where my remains may be found."
